description:
The Shimoochiai family finds tragedy when their oldest daughter Touka is murdered. Help may be on the way when Inspector Fumika Momoshina appears on the scene.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Shimoochiai Touka Satsujin Jiken: Shitara Hen / Shimoochiai Touka Satsujin Jiken: Yotsuyu Hen
The Touka Shimoochiai Murder Case (Shitara Chapter) / The Touka Shimoochiai Murder Case (Yotsuyu Chapter)
下落合桃歌殺人事件 ~シタラ編~ / 下落合桃歌殺人事件 ~夜露編~
